mapper.select: select table_name tableName, engine, table_comment tableComment, create_time createTime from information_schema.tables where table_name = #{tableName}

select column_name columnName, data_type dataType, column_type columnType, CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH columnSize, IFNULL(column_default, 'NULL') columnDefault, column_comment columnComment, column_key columnKey, extra, IS_NULLABLE nullAble from information_schema.columns where table_name = #{tableName} order by ordinal_position
